about_the_game:
A researcher receives an e-mail from Government Officials to meet in a remote location. When he drives there, he suddenly realizes there is a secret city in this location. He tries to figure out the purpose of this city and why he is there.

The game is a third person driving experience. An adventure of a professional to a cult-like organisation. An effortlessly creepy atmosphere, a thriller, a chilling mood.

.

The City: An unholy land. A beautiful city with bad intentions. Gorgeous night visions. I have carefully modelled the city with a fitting architecture. Its creepyness is like De Chirico paintings. Shockingly naked architecture will creep you out! You can look around with your mouse anytime!

.

Exploration: You will be directed by a man from walkie-talkie to finish the tasks. You don't know if anything will happen and don't know why this place even exist. A map, a paper of some sort and a book will lead you to some secrets.

.

Cut-Scenes: Game contains lots of cut-scenes with cinematic angles and great music!

Do you like creepy places without any try-hard atmosphere? A chilling experience without a cheap jumpscare? A book and map related mystery solving? Then this game is for you!

By purchasing this game you will have a Soundtrack (I have composed all the tracks) and a Map of this game also!

content_descriptors.notes:
It is about selling your soul to satan. So I don't know if that is an issue. Secondly there is an altar for "the whore of babylon" which is a historic character. Believers lick the altar to clean it. No other thing that might be mature content.

There is no killing, no other vulgar language. Just two things: satanism and the word "whore".

short_description: This is an adventure game. You can drive the car and look around with mouse. You can interact things with keyboard and mouse functions like a book. I don't want to make a game that tries too hard. I prefer it to be more subtle than edgy. This game is a creepy, almost a thriller driving experience.
